nodes.text: The Moridebo District was a poor area of Metellos, home to the Hellwell.

The district was covered with tiny shacks with dirty rooftops that stood right outside of Stratablock 7. The architecture stayed the same except every once in a while the rooftops were broken by factories, stadiums, and smoking ash-dumps. The district was full of datapushers, factory workers, con artists, thieves, and indigents called groundpounders.
Moridebo also had its own cuisine: a combination of meat and lard made to resemble fruit called 'meatalos'.
